items.sentence: I wasn\'t able to do that as well as Tom could.
I wasn\'t interested in going to Boston anyway.
I have to go to the dentist after school today.
How long has it been since you moved to Boston?
How long have you been running this place, Tom?
You ought to eat now while you have the chance.
Tom climbed all the way to the top of the hill.
I\'ll meet Tom at the station tomorrow at 2:30.
I\'m going to stay here for a couple of months.
There are things that can\'t be left to chance.
